message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SY 

This paper primarily focuses on the security, scalability, and trust issues related to blockchain-based services, which are the main concerns of the computer security (cs.CR), distributed computing (cs.DC), and computer networks (cs.NI) sub-categories. The paper also proposes a sharding protocol for blockchain, which falls under the distributed systems (cs.DS) sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the design and implementation of the proposed protocol, which is related to the systems and control (cs.SY) sub-category.
